mapper.insert: insert into myrecipe (myRecipe_name_kor, myRecipe_name_eng, myRecipe_desc, myRecipe_recipe, myRecipe_hits, user_number) values(#{myRecipeNameKor}, #{myRecipeNameEng},#{myRecipeDesc}, #{myRecipeRecipe}, 0, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: select p.product_name_kor, p.product_system_name, b.pmBridge_vol from myrecipe m, pmbridge b, product p where m.myRecipe_number = #{myRecipeNumber} and b.product_number = p.product_number
